Definition: Given an amazon food product review and its summary, generate "True" if the review and summary match, otherwise generate "False".

Positive Examples.input:
I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most. 
 Summary: Good Quality Dog Food
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer talked about dog food which was good. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is true.

Positive Examples.input:
Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo". 
 Summary: Not as Advertised
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer didn't get the product they show in the advertisement. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is True.

Positive Examples.input:
Great taffy at a great price.  There was a wide assortment of yummy taffy.  Delivery was very quick.  If your a taffy lover, this is a deal. 
 Summary: Good Oatmeal
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer is neutral with the product and he has some complaint. So the summary is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
My daughter loves twizzlers and this shipment of six pounds really hit the spot. It's exactly what you would expect...six packages of strawberry twizzlers. 
 Summary: Lots of twizzlers, just what you expect.
Negative Examples.explanation: It's only supposed to say if the Polarity of given review is "True" or "False"

Negative Examples.input:
I ordered this product for a themed baby shower. They went over well and they tasted just like normal cracker jacks. Loved that I could find the box and they fit perfect in favor bags. 
 Summary: It's a fine cracker
Negative Examples.explanation: It's a correct summary so the answer should be true.

Negative Examples.input:
My cats have been happily eating Felidae Platinum for more than two years. I just got a new bag and the shape of the food is different. They tried the new food when I first put it in their bowls and now the bowls sit full and the kitties will not touch the food. I've noticed similar reviews related to formula changes in the past. Unfortunately, I now need to find a new food that my cats will eat. 
 Summary: My cats loved the food.
Negative Examples.explanation: The customer's cat really didn't eat the food customer order so the summary is wrong. So, the correct answer should be false.

Instances.input:
I bought a couple of flavors from Halo's, both were not a hit with my cats unfortunately. My cats would not touch it. 
 Summary: chiclets

I was surprised by the number of 5 star reviews of this product. Its a tiny gritty seed that gets stuck in every corner of your mouth and the taste is like nothing. Kind of like poppy seeds but with out the taste. I finally ask myself why am I eating this annoying seed and put it out back in the bird feeder unfortunately they don't seem to like it much either. 
 Summary: For the birds

In my office, and for me personally, this is the smoothest and best tasting coffee you can buy for your Keurig machine. Great price too! 
 Summary: MY FAVE

So, I really really wanted to like this stuff, and I tried to make it all the way through one can, but alas I lacked the strength of will. I love ginger ale, and Jamaican ginger ale in particular, but this flavor (and maybe we had a bad batch?) was a whole new, disgusting animal that took me quite a lot of time to pin down my feelings on. Firstly, I felt I was drinking water that had been poured into a glass that used to have Pepto Bismol in it, but had not been rinsed out first. Secondly, I thought maybe it tasted more like truvia had been simply mixed with water into a sickening solution. Third, it made me think that i now know what it would be like to drink generic birch beer after someone else had thrown it up. And, lastly, when i finally gave up, as if giving up on a bet, it just tasted like hostility and sadness.  Do yourself a favor and try a different flavor!  One caveat- Usually, when a company screws up any kind of ginger ale, it is because they seem to make it taste soapy. Kudos to Blue Sky for finding a whole new way to make ginger ale so vile. It doesn't taste soapy at all! 
 Summary: the truvia made our whole family ill

This cherry juice concentrate taste very cherry :-) Country Spoon Montmorency Red Tart Cherry Juice Concentrate 34 oz. I like this product, and, perhaps, I will order this cherry juice concentrate again. Summary: tastes like fresh cherries

I ordered this for a friend at South Carolina for Christmas, i want her to try some Italian chocolates, lol!  The item was arrived earlier than expected, but, nevertheless, it was well packed and only melts on her mouth, she totally loves it.  Three different taste and flavors of Ferreros guarantees to give three different yummy joy, Mmmmm.... 
 Summary: Totally delicious and delightful!

I've bought them many times. Good quality and good taste, baby love it, and I love it too. Reccommend it. 
 Summary: Great in a pinch...portable, healthy

I have two cats. My big boy has eaten these and never had a problem...as a matter of fact he has never vomited or had a hair ball since I adopted him at 2 months. My girl cat throws up every time she eats this particular flavor. Since I treat them equally these are no longer purchased. I hate to see my girl sick so I just recommend you watch your cats after you give them these treats. If not a problem...carry on. 
 Summary: Temptations Vomiting
